titles.title: Increased Transparency in Higher Education Act of 2012
Increased Transparency in Higher Education Act of 2012
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to post certain IRS returns on their websites.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Increased Transparency in Higher Education Act of 2012 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require each nonprofit institution of higher education that receives federal financial assistance to post its tax return on its website.
